explains: n. 重要，著名；突起，凸出；（尤指地形或身体部位）凸出物；日珥

sentences.en: He came to prominence during the World Cup.
sentences.cn: 他在该世界杯期间一举成名。

sentences.en: Crime prevention had to be given more prominence.
sentences.cn: 犯罪预防得给予更多重视。

sentences.en: She has achieved a prominence she hardly deserves.
sentences.cn: 她实在不配享有这么大的名声。
